resources.string: Our events are possible thanks to many diversity supporting companies. We also work with external partners, speakers and tutors. If you are interested in a partnership of any kind, for example hosting our event, feel free to reach out via Slack TODO or other communication channels - check the social media tab TODO! We have previously worked with the following companies:

Women Techmakers Berlin is part of a global Women Techmakers program run by Google. At Women Techmakers Berlin we are encouraging diversity in tech in Berlin since 2015. Get visibility, networking and resources to make the tech community of Berlin diverse and inclusive! We have different activities: intense study groups, inspirational fireside chats and international events. New and existing members are always welcome to all of the events, and all events are always opened for everyone, regardless of your gender/age/race/experience, etc. We follow the Berlin code of conduct for communities: http://berlincodeofconduct.org
No upcoming events at the moment. Stay tuned!

We are active across social media. You can find all our events on Meetup. Slack is one of the main parts of our Community - it is a good place to connect with other members, offer positions in #job-postings that reach more diverse audience or announce free/discounted diversity tickets. For Twitter you can use #womentechmakers.
